name: 施議訓
objective:
先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。探討材料強度、彈性塑性及建立理論之數學架構，探討金屬的流動性與破壞，及機械行為所須之冶金基礎，金屬成形時其相關冶金及機械因子及機械實驗之冶金變數。　　　　　　　　　　本課程講述瞭解機械冶金的單晶之塑性變形、結晶學以及差排理論，並針對強化機構、材料測試以及包括破壞力學及金屬加工等特殊之機械冶金型態加以介紹說明。本課程之目的在使學生能建立機械冶金基本知識，可進一步將研究中所觀察之機械冶金行為與理論機制加以結合。
This course introduces the plastic deformation of single crystals, crystallography, and dislocation theory of mechanical metallurgy. The strengthening mechanisms and test of materials, and some special types of fracture mechanics and metalworking are also stated. The objective of this course is to establish the fundamental knowledge of mechanical metallurgy for the students and to further connect the observed mechanical metallurgy behavior to the theoretical mechanisms in researches.
課程目標：
1. 瞭解機械冶金理論
2. 瞭解單晶之塑性變形
3. 瞭解差排理論
4. 瞭解強化機構
5. 瞭解材料測試
6. 瞭解破壞力學
7. 瞭解金屬加工之基礎
8. 培養學生解決問題的能力
9. 培養學生收集資料的能力
 (Course objectives)：
1. To understand Mechanical Metallurgy
2. To understand Plastic Deformation of Single Crystals
3. To understand Dislocation Theory
4. To understand Strengthening Mechanisms
5. To understand Test of Materials
6. To understand Fracture Mechanics
7. To understand Fundamentals of Metalworking
8. To cultivate the capability of problem solving
9. To cultivate the capability of information collection
